item.title: Boarding Schools: China’s Tool to Assimilate Tibetan Children
item.description: The Chinese government is placing hundreds of thousands of Tibetan children in boarding schools, as a way to mold them into citizens loyal to Beijing....

item.title: Lebanese Lawmakers Choose a President After 2 Years of Gridlock
item.description: As the country endured economic crisis and a devastating war, lawmakers failed 12 times to pick a head of state. They have now settled on Joseph Aoun,...

item.title: U.S. Saw an Opportunity While It Pushed to Arm Ukraine
item.description: The White House seized a rare chance to undermine Russia and build up regional allies as it built a coalition to support the Ukrainians.

item.title: Who Is Pierre Poilievre, the Conservative Leader on a Path to Become Canada’s Next Prime Minister?
item.description: Pierre Poilievre, the Conservative leader, enjoys a commanding lead in the polls as Canadians look to the next general election.

item.title: With Trump Arriving, Zelensky Urges Allies Not to ‘Drop the Ball’
